articles.title: Study shows link between morning physical activity and lowest risk of heart disease, stroke - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Morning physical activity is associated with the lowest risk of heart disease and stroke, according to a study in more than 85,000 individuals published today in the European Journal of Preventive Cardiology, a journal of the ESC.

articles.author: Horsetalk.co.nz
articles.title: Expansion of equine flaviviruses a realistic threat in Europe, say scientists - Horsetalk
articles.description: Horses and other equids can be infected with several viruses of the family Flaviviridae.
